Extensions/HTTPServer.html#/s:9WebSocket.name: webSocketUpgrader(maxFrameSize:shouldUpgrade:onUpgrade:)
Extensions/HTTPServer.html#/s:9WebSocket.abstract: Creates an HTTPProtocolUpgrader that will accept incoming WebSocket upgrade requests.

Extensions/HTTPClient.html#/s:9WebSocket.name: webSocket(scheme:hostname:port:path:headers:maxFrameSize:on:)
Extensions/HTTPClient.html#/s:9WebSocket.abstract: Performs an HTTP protocol upgrade toWebSocket protocol HTTPClient.

Extensions/HTTPClient.html.name: HTTPClient
Extensions/HTTPClient.html.abstract: Allows HTTPClient to be used to create WebSocket connections.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC6.name: onText(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC6.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to receive text-formatted messages.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC8.name: onBinary(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC8.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to receive binary-formatted messages.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.name: onError(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to handle errors.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC1.name: onCloseCode(_:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC1.abstract: Adds a callback to this WebSocket to handle incoming close codes.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.name: send(binary:promise:)
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC4.abstract: Sends binary-formatted data to the connected client.

Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.name: onClose
Classes/WebSocket.html#/s:9WebSocketAAC7.abstract: A Future that will be completed when the WebSocket closes.

Classes/WebSocket.html.name: WebSocket
Classes/WebSocket.html.abstract: Represents a client connected via WebSocket protocol.
